definition: Kobe Bryant/abbr. for 科比·布萊恩特|科比·布莱恩特[Ke1 bi3 · Bu4 lai2 en1 te4]
branch of study/administrative section/division/field/branch/stage directions/family (taxonomy)/rules/laws/to mete out (punishment)/to levy (taxes etc)/to fine sb/CL:個|个[ge4]
Belgium/Belgian/abbr. for 比利時|比利时[Bi3 li4 shi2]
euphemistic variant of 屄[bi1]
to compare/(followed by a noun and adjective) more {adj.} than {noun}/ratio/to gesture/(Taiwan pr. [bi4] in some compounds derived from Classical Chinese)
Kobe Bryant (1978-2020), Los Angeles Lakers NBA star
pinyin: Ke1 bi3 · Bu4 lai2 en1 te4

sentences.english: This past offseason there were tons of reports circulating around Kobe Bryant's wish to be traded.
sentences.chinese: 過去的那個休賽期，有很多關於科比想被交易的報道。

sentences.english: "Let's go for it again, " Bryant said, moments before hoisting the finals MVP trophy.
sentences.chinese: “我們再來一次吧”科比在接過MVP獎盃前狂喊。

sentences.english: In fact, what Bynum is doing now mirrors Bryant's M. O .
sentences.chinese: 事實上，拜納姆現在的作爲正式科比的映射。

sentences.english: That the 32 points Kobe Bryant hung on them three days earlier would have been convincing enough.
sentences.chinese: 三天前拿下32分的科比已經令人心悅誠服了。

sentences.english: After the game the kopeck only said to him "our training battalion sees".
sentences.chinese: 賽後科比只跟他說了一句“我們訓練營見”。

sentences.english: But right now, I want to focus on four of Kobe's on-court weaknesses.
sentences.chinese: 不過現在，我只想說說科比在場上的四處弱點。

sentences.english: Kobe and I did work well together - for four months, that is.
sentences.chinese: 科比和我在這四個月中確實合作得很好。

sentences.english: Kobe Bryant smiled when told what Iverson said.
sentences.chinese: 科比聽到艾佛森所說的話後笑了。

sentences.english: The Lakers have former MVP Kobe Bryant pairing with Fisher in their starting back-court.
sentences.chinese: 湖人的後衛陣容有前MVP科比和費舍爾的配對。

sentences.english: But make no mistake; Gasol and Bryant are totally geeked about the Olympics.
sentences.chinese: 了，加索爾和科比在奧林匹克運動會上完全沒經驗。

sentences.english: Kobe Bryant claims he's a better one-on-one player than LeBron James.
sentences.chinese: 科比強調與詹姆斯相比，他的一對一能力更強。

sentences.english: There is no question that he is the toughest guy to cover in the NBA.
sentences.chinese: 毫無疑問科比是全聯盟最難防的傢伙。

sentences.english: Kobe also topped the list in the US and China.
sentences.chinese: 在美國和中國銷售榜上，科比的球衣也是銷量第一。

sentences.english: Kobe and Team USA are gearing up for the qualifying tourney.
sentences.chinese: 奧運會資格，科比和美國隊都開足了馬力。

sentences.english: However, he seems most interested in the Virtus offer.
sentences.chinese: 但是，科比似乎對那份意大利的合同最感興趣。

sentences.english: John Corbett thinks there will be a 'Sex and the City 3' movie.
sentences.chinese: 約翰科比特認爲電影《慾望都市》會拍續集三。
